pageContext.claim: “NBC NEWS is wrong again! They cite sources' which are constantly wrong. Problem is, like so many others, the sources probably don’t exist, they are fabricated, fiction! NBC, my former home with the Apprentice, is now as bad as Fake News CNN. Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: NBC news made an error in reporting that prosecutors had obtained a wiretap on Trump attorney Michael Cohen's phone; it was only a log of calls. So its sources were wrong, not fake. The network corrected the error.
